Sentencas: In this work, powders of La0.6Sr0.4Fe0.8Co0.2O3-delta were prepared by the auto-combustion of ethylene glycol-metal nitrate polymerised gel precursor.
Titulo: Low-Temperature Preparation of La0.6Sr0.4Fe0.8Co0.2O3-δ Sinterable Nanopowders by the Polymeric Organic Complex Solution Method

Sentencas: This method (polymeric organic complex solution) allows decreasing the processing temperature and simplifies the whole procedure.
Titulo: Low-Temperature Preparation of La0.6Sr0.4Fe0.8Co0.2O3-δ Sinterable Nanopowders by the Polymeric Organic Complex Solution Method

Sentencas: A single phase material is obtained at 300 degrees C lower than that needed by conventional solid state reaction (SSR).
Titulo: Low-Temperature Preparation of La0.6Sr0.4Fe0.8Co0.2O3-δ Sinterable Nanopowders by the Polymeric Organic Complex Solution Method

Sentencas: The reduced particle size and low agglomeration increases the reactivity of powders and therefore, the sintering temperature is also reduced in 200 degrees C with respect to the conventional SSR method.
Titulo: Low-Temperature Preparation of La0.6Sr0.4Fe0.8Co0.2O3-δ Sinterable Nanopowders by the Polymeric Organic Complex Solution Method

Sentencas: As a consequence of that, the microstructures are controlled maintaining the grain size in an almost nanometric range.
Titulo: Low-Temperature Preparation of La0.6Sr0.4Fe0.8Co0.2O3-δ Sinterable Nanopowders by the Polymeric Organic Complex Solution Method
